name: Shorten a URL using Bitly and add it to a record in Airtable
description:
Every time a URL is added to a Airtable record, the URL is shortened using Bitly and the record in the table is updated with the new link. 
Airtable template: https://airtable.com/shrkYtYxixUTEZuIZ/tblr4HNg1GzziFkk7/viwotnINcakYGuB5n?blocks=hide
